name: Brandywine Valley Talent
overview:
Brandywine Valley Talent is a full service live entertainment company. BVT provides entertainment for special events in the Philadelphia area, including weddings, mitzvahs, corporate events, and many others.

BVT’s roster of Philadelphia wedding bands has received many awards including, Best of Philly, Best of the Main Line, and Best of Delaware. BVT has also been named one of The Knots Brides Picks.

Brandywine Valley Talent’s Inspired Emotions division also provides smaller ensembles such as string quartets and Jazz trios for more intimate affairs.

BVT is one of the premiere agencies for Philadelphia wedding bands, and with 9 bands, has one of the largest and most diverse roster of bands in the area.

BVT’s bands include Jellyroll, perhaps the most requested Philadelphia wedding band working today. The rest of BVT’s roster is filled out by the Sid Miller Dance Band, Big Ric Rising, City Rhythm, Contagious, Back2Life, Strangers, Bounce, and Midnight Hour.

BVT bandleaders not only have extensive experience providing entertainment for Philadelphia area weddings, but they also boast years of experience planning and running events.
